rules_text:
Whenever another 2/2 creature enters under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Mr. Barry Grizmore, Esquire.
Mr. Barry Grizmore, Esquire counts a non-Bear Human creature for spells and effects you don’t control.
notes:
Inspiration — Animals/Monsters hiding as humans

Mechanical Uniqueness — Pseudo-creature-type-ing on opponent’s spells

**Designer’s note: Moved him here due to his unique bottom ability, especially given there are other case files operating in a similar space.

Should have something that doesn’t affect humans
